objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED
objects.description: Always leave this constant as false, only set to true for automated testing

objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_EVALUATION_CHIEF_VISIBILITY
objects.description:
Toggles whether or not evaluations have an evaluation chief.  Evaluation chiefs have contracting team level access in many parts of the application, so if you do not want any evaluators with elevated access, then this should be set to FALSE.

NOTE: If this toggle is set to FALSE in your environment, you will not want to place any users in the Evaluation Chairs group, as this groups also has contracting personnel level access and based on this toggle it will add/remove the Evaluation Chair group in the daily nightly process.

objects.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_EVALUATION_RECORD_LIST_ASSIGNMENT_DISPLAY_ONLY
objects.description: Toggles whether or not the evaluation record list displays all evaluations or just those to which the u-ser is assigned.  If TRUE, only those assigned to or created by the user will be displayed.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse
objects.description: Default a null value to false, otherwise returns the boolean value

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
objects.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_castToMap
objects.description: Casts the input to map, either a list or a non-list depending on the input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_castToMapList
objects.description: Casts the input to a map list

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIfUserExists
objects.description: Returns true if the user exists

objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is null/empty. Returns True or False.

objects.description: Returns a display name for a user in the format of "firstName lastName". Null-safe.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_distinct
objects.description: Returns the distinct values from a list.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
objects.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues
objects.description: Returns any record that contains any of the provided values in the field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDate
objects.description: Formats a date for read-only text display. Note, do not use this rule to format date times, only dates. Returns text.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
objects.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
objects.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank
objects.description: A not() wrapped around AS_CO_UT_isBlank

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_isUserMemberOfGroups
objects.description: Returns true if the user is a member of any of the groups (or condition), uses `loggedInUser()` if `user` input is null

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_left
objects.description: Executes the `left()` function with error handling for a null input

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_not
objects.description: Null handles for not -- null returns true (null acts like false)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord
objects.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
objects.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
objects.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

objects.name: AS_CO_UT_returnMembersOfAnyGroups
objects.description: Returns all unique members who are members of ANY of the input groups, the members must be in at least one of the groups
